name: Off-Road Snow Bus Driving 2018
description:
Off-Road Winter Bus Simulator 2018: Santa Rush Gift Delivery Game
It’s a beautiful day of winters. People are enjoying the winter vacations with their families and children. The crazy thing of winters is the Christmas Eve and big snow. With the blanket of snow and days of winters, people need to do some fun. Town’s people are very excited and cannot wait anymore for Santa in this real snow Christmas bus game. They are waiting desperately and sharing their feelings by trading gifts among each other. People have placed Christmas trees on the road sides and at door step of every house. Children are playing with soft and big snow in this santa rush gift delivery game. They are making snow castles and snowman in this real Christmas snowfall games. It seems everyone is really very excited for this Christmas Eve. So, Enjoy ride of big snow bus in snow capped mountains.
Are you ready to drive the tourist bus on snowy hill stations? This is the best winter Bus simulation game for all ages including kids. As luxury bus driver in hilly roads, drive heavy buses on beautiful mountain roads and drive on long journey in this tourist bus parking game. It's not that easy to be great hill driver because driving a bus filled with tourist inside the hills and dangerous mountains is a duty of great responsibility. Drive this extreme offroad Coach Bus simulator game and safely transport the passengers. It is very cold out there and your duty is to pick the passengers along with Santa in snow roads from one hill station, drop them safely to their destination and deliver gift to kids in this Santa gift delivery game 2018. Be careful while driving the big bus on steep hills, high mountains because the roads are slippery and extremely dangerous.
More than 5 buses are designed for this Christmas games. It is painted in red and decorated with flowers in this Christmas racing game. It gives a fun full shine and looks pretty amazing in this collect santa gift delivery game. People are standing alongside the road to welcome Santa Claus in this real Christmas driving game. The soft and soothing snow triggers the fun from the inside in this Christmas game.
Select the snow bus and drive through different Offroad Mountains and hill station resorts. The gameplay of this real Christmas driving game is very easy and fun full. Players of all ages can play and enjoy this Santa cargo bus game for free. What you have to do is, drive the decorated big bus and deliver gifts to people. The Santa Claus will distribute all the gifts. Drive heavy bus like in other bus driving games. Be careful with children playing along the roadway in this bus driver Game 2018.
If you have no WIFI, you can play Snow Christmas Bus Simulator 2018- gift game absolutely free.

FEATURES ===========  
- 3D Hilly and mountains Environment. 
- Beautifully designed buses with santa textures
 - Different beautiful and amazing locations 
- A Unique Concept for Christmas game lovers
 - Amazing Gameplay with HD Graphics 
- Realistic Snow environment Map 
- Animated Santa like idle, walking, entering/exiting the bus - Cool and smooth graphics
 - Amazing Bus Selection mode
